test.name: BindingInFaces
test.description: Test of binding to pageInput, pageFlow, sharedFlow in a JSF page.

test.name: HitFacesPageDirectly
test.description: Test to ensure that our JSF page filter doesn't blow up when you hit a JSF page directly.

test.name: InitMemberFields
test.description: Test of initialization of backing class fields marked with @Jpf.SharedFlowField and @Jpf.PageFlowField.

test.name: JpfFaces
test.description: Test of basic JSF / page flow integration, including raising actions and passing forms from JSF pages and backing files.

test.name: OnCreate
test.description: Test to ensure that the FacesContext is available during onCreate() in a backing bean, and that the backing bean is still available to the JSF page for databinding.

test.name: OnRestore
test.description: Test to ensure that onRestore() is called before restoring a page through Jpf.NavigateTo.{currentPage,previousPage}, and that page inputs are updated and available during onRestore().

test.name: RestorePreviousBackingBean
test.description: Test of restoring the backing bean of a JSF page when returning to it through navigateTo=Jpf.NavigateTo.currentPage or navigateTo=Jpf.NavigateTo.previousPage.

test.name: RestorePreviousPage
test.description: Test of restoring the component tree of a JSF page when returning to it through navigateTo=Jpf.NavigateTo.currentPage or navigateTo=Jpf.NavigateTo.previousPage.

test.name: SubmitFormBean
test.description: Test of sending a form bean to a Page Flow action in two ways: (1) through the "submitFormBean" attribute (f:attribute tag) inside of h:commandLink or h:commandButton, or (2) through an 'outputFormBean' attribute on @Jpf.RaiseAction in a backing file command handler.

test.name: UseFormBean
test.description: Test to ensure that sending a form bean from a JSF page to an action (where the action specifies useFormBean=some member variable) causes the page flow form bean member variable to be replaced with the one sent from the JSF page.
